td.content: s:a m curator aged 51 years presents with Liver of 6 weeks duration. he has smoked two packs of cigarettes a day since 4 years he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 163 cm, Weight 71.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:white male aged 51 yrs presents with Liver x 12 days. smokes 2 pack/day of cigarettes for the past 5 years drinks daily o:Height 162 cm, Weight 70.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Hepatitis A Ab IgG, Liver Function Panel.

Value.Value: ordered Hepatitis A Ab IgG , Liver Function Panel

content2.Value: ordered Hepatitis A Ab IgG , Liver Function Panel

td.content: s:52 yr old white male complains of Liver x 3 weeks. NKDA. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 69.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 13 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ibuprofen - 600 mg every 8 hours for fever, and ordered Viral Hepatitis A Antibody.
